channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins database Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins database Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2242|2024-08-04T07:01:41.169Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20database%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins database Plugin 1.6 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to Jenkins to connect to an attacker-specified database server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-2241|2024-08-04T07:01:41.167Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20database%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins database Plugin 1.6 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified database server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-2240|2024-08-04T07:01:41.126Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20database%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins database Plugin 1.6 and earlier allows attackers to execute arbitrary SQL scripts.
